mapper.select: SELECT cst.bookreport_no bookreport_no, cst.comment_content comment_content, cst.comment_no comment_no, cst.comment_write_date comment_write_date, br.bookreport_title bookreport_title, br.report_kind report_kind FROM comment_list cst INNER JOIN bookreport br ON cst.bookreport_no = br.bookreport_no WHERE cst.user_email = #{user_email}
